dcterms:creator: A. Pesaranghader
H. L. Viktor
dcterms:description: The Circle dataset includes 30 evolving domains, where data points are sampled from 30 2D Gaussian distributions. Concept shift is introduced by gradually changing the center and radius of the decision boundary over time.
dcterms:title: Circle Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Pesaranghader
H. L. Viktor
dcterms:description: The Sine dataset is extended to 24 evolving domains by rearranging it. To test models whether they can adapt to sudden change, the labels of Sine-C are reversed from the 6th domain to the last one.
dcterms:title: Sine Dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Qin
S. Wang
H. Li
dcterms:description: Sine-C is a variant of the Sine dataset created for Evolving Domain Generalization settings, where the labels are reversed from the 6th domain to the last one.
dcterms:title: Sine-C Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Ghifary
W. B. Kleijn
M. Zhang
D. Balduzzi
dcterms:description: The Rotated MNIST dataset consists of MNIST digits with varying degrees of rotation.
dcterms:title: Rotated MNIST (RMNIST) Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Ginosar
K. Rakelly
S. Sachs
B. Yin
A. A. Efros
dcterms:description: The Portraits dataset contains photos of high-school seniors from the 1900s to the 2000s for gender classification, split into 34 domains based on a fixed interval over time.
dcterms:title: Portraits Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Hoffman
T. Darrell
K. Saenko
dcterms:description: The Caltran dataset is a real-world surveillance dataset comprising images captured from a fixed traffic camera deployed in an intersection, involving predicting the type of scene based on continuously evolving data.
dcterms:title: Caltran Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. A. Dau
A. Bagnall
K. Kamgar
C.-C. M. Yeh
Y. Zhu
S. Gharghabi
C. A. Ratanamahatana
E. Keogh
dcterms:description: The Elec dataset is designed for the time-section prediction of current power supply based on the hourly records of an Italian electricity company, with concept shifts arising from changes in season, weather, or price.
dcterms:title: Elec Dataset
